extra: This was hardly a fight, but merely Piccolo attacking Raditz. The Saiyan was about to destroy the Namek when his scouter located Goku, so he flew off to find his brother
Krillin tried to attack Raditz, but was knocked down just by a swipe of Raditz's tail
Raditz kneed Goku in the stomach, kidnapped Gohan and told Goku to kill 100 people or he would kill Gohan

fight: Goku, Piccolo and Gohan (Enraged) vs. Raditz
extra: The first major DBZ fight in which Raditz is finally killed (together with Goku who was holding Raditz in place) when Piccolo fired a beam through them both
Training before the Saiyans arrive on Kami's lookout
Training before the Saiyans arrive on Kami's lookout - although Yajirobe wasn't really trying

fight: Tien Shinhan, Yamcha, Krillin, and Chiaotzu vs. Shorty and Scarface (anime only)
charactersGood: Tien Shinhan, Yamcha, Krillin, and Chiaotzu

extra: This was only the first time Gohan sees a full moon and thus turns into a giant destructive ape. Piccolo destroys the moon to turn Gohan back to normal
After surviving on his own for 6 months, Piccolo decides to train Gohan
Tien easily defeated the 'grown' Saibaman (who had the same power level as Raditz)
The Saibaman who self destructs while holding Yamcha, killing them both
Enraged by Yamcha's death Krillin takes on all 4 remaining Saibamen and kills 3 of them in a single blast
Trying to go for Gohan, the last Saibaman is caught by Piccolo and disintegrated
No matter how much Tien fights he is no match for Nappa and even gets his hand cut off
Clinging to Nappa's back he self destructs to protect Tien, but Nappa is barely scratched

fight: Piccolo, Krillin, and Gohan vs. Nappa
extra: Piccolo is killed when he jumps in front of a blast that is shot at Gohan
Goku finally arrives and makes a fool out of Nappa by breaking his back (Vegeta consequently kills the useless Nappa)
The second great fight in DBZ - with Goku's new kai-o-ken technique they are evenly matched with punches flying back and forth
Vegeta throws a fake moon into the air and transforms into a Great Ape, still being aware of himself and continues to crush Goku badly

fight: Gohan, Krillin, and Yajirobe vs. Vegeta (Great Ape)
extra: Vegeta's Great Ape state is finally brought down when Yajirobe cuts of Vegeta's tail
The weakened Vegeta and very angry Gohan fight in a match that is finally even between the two

fight: Goku, Krillin, and Gohan (Spirit Bomb) vs. Vegeta
extra: Goku uses his 2nd new technique and creates a Spirit Bomb that Krillin eventually throws at Vegeta
Angered with the guy who cut off his tail, Vegeta beats up Yajirobe
Gohan looks up at the fake moon and transforms into a Great Ape and beats up Vegeta. Vegeta eventually slices off the tail, but is finally defeated

fight: Krillin and Gohan vs. Banan and Sui
extra: Frieza's henchmen are easily dealt with
Thinking himself much stronger, Cui follows Vegeta to Namek, however he is killed in just one blast by Vegeta
Many Namekians are killed in Frieza's attempts to locate the Dragon Balls
Unable to take it any longer, Gohan & Krillin fly in to kick Dodoria through a building, save the Namekian Dende, and fly off
Vegeta learns from Dodoria that it was Frieza who destroyed the Saiyan home planet before killing him
Vegeta easily defeats the base form of Zarbon, but once Zarbon transformed he is effortlessly beat and thrown into a lake

fight: Yamcha, Tien Shinhan, and Chiaotzu vs. Piccolo
extra: The 4 deceased from the Vegeta saga finally arrive on King Kai's planet as well and start training
Becoming much more powerful after getting healed from his previous fight, Vegeta now swiftly deals with Zarbon
Ginyu forces' Guldo really only knows how to freeze time & people, but right before stabbing Gohan & Krillin he is beheaded by Vegeta

fight: Vegeta, Gohan, and Krillin vs. Recoome
extra: Out of desperation Krillin and Gohan team up with Vegeta to battle Ginyu force's Recoome, but they are not match him
Goku finally arrives on Namek, becoming much stronger while training on the space ship. He takes out Recoome in one punch in the stomach
Two other members of the Ginyu force also prove to be no match for Goku
Goku takes out Burter (who is later killed by Vegeta) but lets Jeice fly away
Starting out even, Goku eventually powers up and is much stronger than Ginyu. Ginyu then uses his body change attack to switch bodies
On his way to the Grand Elder of Namek, Frieza easily disposes of some Namekians that try to defend the Elder
To buy some time Nail, the last warrior Namekian, lures Frieza away, but is eventually still no match for Frieza who only fights with 1 arm

fight: Gohan and Krillin vs. Captain Ginyu (Goku's body)
extra: Still figuring out his new body, Ginyu is being beaten by Gohan and Krillin
After healing from a Sensu bean, Vegeta is now much stronger than Jeice and kills him
Vegeta is winning the fight so Ginyu tries to change bodies again, but Goku jumps in the way and returns to his own body
Nail is badly beaten, but is not killed by Frieza

fight: Vegeta, Gohan and Krillin vs. Frieza (1st form)
extra: The Z fighters are trying to buy time until Goku is ready to fight again, but they are no match
An intense power struggle leaves Vegeta out of breath while Frieza has not even broken a sweat
After seeing Krillin speared by Frieza, Gohan finds the anger to attack, but is eventually severely beaten
Being healed by Dende, Krillin came in just in time to stop Frieza from killing Gohan
After being wished back to life and to Namek and fusing with Nail, Piccolo joins the battle and is pretty evenly matched, thus Frieza transforms again
In his horrible 3rd form Frieza is dominating the fight, piercing Piccolo with one finger beams
Trying to save his master, Gohan takes over the fight and throws his biggest Masenko ever. Frieza manages to bounce it away with effort, thus deciding to transform into his final form

fight: Gohan, Krillin, & Piccolo vs. Frieza (Final Form)
extra: After killing Dende so the Z fighters couldn't get healed again, Frieza tries to kill Gohan but Vegeta slams him aside just in time
Although Vegeta again experienced a major power boost through healing, he is easily beaten to a pulp and eventually killed
Even with a kai-o-ken times 20 technique Goku is not strong enough to beat Frieza, although he does manage to roughen him up a bit
Frieze powers up to 50% after which Goku decides that a Spirit Bomb is their only hope
After even the Spirit Bomb wasn't enough and blowing up his best friend Krillin, Goku transforms into a Super Saiyan finally having the advantage in the fight
As a desperate measure Frieza throws an energy ball at Namek's core, which will make the planet explode in '5' minutes
Absorbed in the Saiyan fighting frenzy, Goku lets Frieza go to 100% of his strength instead of finishing him off. Frieza then smashes Goku into a volcano from which he doesn't reappear
After being told his dad is dead, Gohan again rages against Frieza, trying to buy time so Frieza would still be on Namek when the planet explodes

fight: Goku (Super Saiyan) vs. Frieza (Final Form-100% Depleted)
extra: Goku bursts out of the volcano, saves his son and battles on with Frieza, finally having the true upper hand. Frieza manages to cut himself in half with his own attack and is left for dead
Not really a fight, merely Vegeta slapping Gohan's hand away after Gohan tries to thank him

fight: Kami and Mr Popo vs. The Spice Boys and Garlic Jr.
charactersBad: The Spice Boys and Garlic Jr.

fight: Piccolo vs. The Spice Boys, Roshi (Infected), Chi-Chi (Infected), Yamcha (Infected)
charactersBad: The Spice Boys, Roshi (Infected), Chi-Chi (Infected), Yamcha (Infected)

fight: Gohan, Piccolo, and Krillin vs. Garlic Jr.
Gohan, Piccolo, and Krillin vs. Garlic Jr. (transformed)
Future Trunks vs. King Cold's soldiers
extra: In about 2 seconds all the soldiers are cut down

fight: Future Trunks (Super Saiyan) vs. Mecha Frieza
extra: After toying with Frieza for a while, Trunks swiftly slices the evil one into many pieces and disintegrates those, finally killing him for real

fight: Future Trunks (Super Saiyan) vs. King Cold
extra: King Cold, Frieza's father, tries to recruit Trunks, but Trunks again quickly blasts him through the heart and then the face

fight: Future Trunks (Super Saiyan) vs. Goku (Super Saiyan) (sparring)
extra: Trunks tests Goku's powers by attacking him with his sword while Goku blocks all attacks with just his index finger
During the 3 year training period before the Androids arrive
During the 3 year training period before the Androids arrive

fight: Goku and Piccolo vs. Gohan (training) (anime only)
extra: During the 3 year training period before the Androids arrive
Yamcha is grabbed by the face, his energy is drained while Android 20 pierces his hand through Yamcha's chest
Goku is easily winning until he his finally hit by the heart disease and collapses
Vegeta surprises everyone by having become a Super Saiyan as well. He quickly takes care of Android 19, but not before toying with him for a while
Although Piccolo is stronger, the arrival of Trunks is the distraction Android 20 needs to escape

fight: Goku (Super Saiyan) vs. Android 20 (in Goku's nightmare) (anime only)
extra: in Goku's nightmare
Krillin is no match and is barely alive after Android 20 flees back to his lab to turn on the other Androids
Android 18 broke Vegeta's arm in one swift kick and easily won
Trunks tries to help his father but his sword swipe is blocked

fight: Piccolo and Tien Shinhan vs. Android 17
extra: Although trying to help Trunks, Piccolo and Tien are also easily beating and left in a crippled heap
Piccolo has the clear advantage, but let's Cell absorb his arm so he can find out about Cell's origins (Piccolo then regenerates his arm)
Knowing that he isn't strong enough, Krillin still battles Cell, but is almost beaten to death
Starting out evenly matched, Android's infinite energy eventually seems to get the better over Piccolo's stamina

fight: Piccolo and Android 17 vs. Cell (Imperfect Form)
extra: Trying to absorb the Android, Piccolo and 17 team up to fight off Cell
Finally the peace-loving Android steps in and starts beating Cell
After having absorbed Android 17, Android 16 is longer powerful enough to be a challenge for Cell
Tien blasts Cell with is Tri Beam attack, giving Androids 16 & 18 time to escape
Tien eventually collapses due to lack of energy, giving Cell the opportunity to chase the remaining Androids

fight: Vegeta (2nd Grade Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Semi-Perfect Form)
extra: With Vegeta being too strong for Cell, Cell abuses Vegeta's arrogance to let him find and absorb Android 18

fight: Future Trunks (Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Semi-Perfect Form)
extra: Trunks is not ok with his fathers decision to let Cell go and steps in to try and prevent Cell from absorbing Android 18

fight: Future Trunks (2nd Grade Super Saiyan) vs. Vegeta (2nd Grade Super Saiyan)
extra: Annoyed with his son interfering, Vegeta starts to fight Trunks so Cell has the time to absorb Android 18

fight: Krillin, Android 16, Android 18, and Future Trunks (2nd Grade Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Semi-Perfect Form)
charactersGood: Krillin, Android 16, Android 18, and Future Trunks (2nd Grade Super Saiyan)
extra: Using a solar flare to blind the others, Cell manages to finally find the moment to absorb Android 18, transforming him into his Perfect Form
Goku and Gohan train for a year in the Hyperbolic Time Chamber (only a day passes on Earth) to prepare for fighting Cell
During the training in the Hyperbolic Time Chamber Gohan manages to become a Super Saiyan

fight: Krillin and Future Trunks (2nd Grade Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Perfect Form)
charactersGood: Krillin and Future Trunks (2nd Grade Super Saiyan)
extra: In his perfect state none of the attacks are having an effect on Cell. He knocks down Krillin badly, braking most of his bones

fight: Vegeta (2nd Grade Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Perfect Form)
extra: Vegeta is expecting a challenge, but Cell is too strong for him. Vegeta blasts half of Cell away, but Cell regenerates due to having Piccolo's cells

fight: Future Trunks (2nd Grade Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Perfect Form)
extra: Trunks takes over after Vegeta is knocked unconscious

fight: Future Trunks (3rd Grade Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Perfect Form)
extra: Even with a large boost in strength, it was the lack of speed of this 3rd grade SSJ that made it useless to Trunks
Mr. Satan attempts to fight, but with a smack, Mr. Satan is sent flying from the ring

fight: Goku (Full-Power Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Perfect Form)
extra: The fight starts out evenly matched, but after a while Goku forfeits and says Gohan should take over

fight: Gohan (Full-Power Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Perfect Form)
extra: Gohan does rather poorly and almost dies, while Goku keeps telling his son to get mad
Android 16 tries to self-destruct and kill Cell, but, unbeknown to him, his bomb was removed earlier. Cell then blows 16 to pieces

fight: Goku (Full-Power Super Saiyan), Vegeta (2nd Grade Super Saiyan), Future Trunks (3rd Grade Super Saiyan), Piccolo, Krillin, Tien Shinhan, and Yamcha vs. 7 Cell Jr.s
charactersGood: Goku (Full-Power Super Saiyan), Vegeta (2nd Grade Super Saiyan), Future Trunks (3rd Grade Super Saiyan), Piccolo, Krillin, Tien Shinhan, and Yamcha
extra: Intrigued by Gohan's hidden powers, Cell creates 7 mini Cells that start beating up all the Z warriors
After a speech by Android 16's head Gohan is finally enraged enough to turn SSJ 2 and then kills all the Cell Jr's with ease

fight: Gohan (Super Saiyan 2) vs. Cell (Perfect and Power-Weighted Forms)
extra: Gohan is now superior to Cell and starts to toy with him. He makes Cell spit out Android 18 which transform Cell back to his Semi-perfect Form
Being the clear loser Cell decides to self-destruct and blow up the World

fight: Vegeta (2nd Grade Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Super Perfect Form)
extra: Cell managed to regenerate from his self-destruct and returns even more powerful and instantly kills Trunks, which enrages Vegeta, but Cell is too strong

fight: Gohan (Super Saiyan 2), Piccolo, Krillin, Tien Shinhan, Yamcha, and Vegeta (2nd Grade Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Super Perfect Form)
charactersGood: Gohan (Super Saiyan 2), Piccolo, Krillin, Tien Shinhan, Yamcha, and Vegeta (2nd Grade Super Saiyan)
extra: It takes Gohan a great deal of effort, but every part of Cell's body is finally disintegrated when he blasts his Father-Son Kamehameha

fight: Future Trunks (Super Saiyan) vs. Future Android 17 and Android 18
extra: After returning to the future, Trunks deals with the Androids in mere minutes

fight: Future Trunks (Super Saiyan) vs. Cell (Imperfect Form: alternate timeline)
extra: Three years after returning to the future, Trunks knows Imperfect Cell is coming, drags him outside of the city and blasts him into smithereens

fight: Goku vs. Jeice, Burter, Recoome, and Guldo (anime only)
Pikkon vs. Cell, Frieza, and King Cold (anime only)

extra: Quite some years since the Cell games, Gohan, now a teenager, stops a few robbers
Not a physical fight but merely Videl and Chi-Chi screaming at each other
After easily defeating all other kids in the youth division, the final battle in the tournament is between Goku's new son and Vegeta's son. After cheating on both ends, Trunks eventually wins
A slight tap on the cheek sends Mr. Satan flying out of the ring
Krillin easily wins this match in the tournament
The Supreme Kai uses magic to paralyze Piccolo who then has no other choice but to give up
Videl is beaten senseless and almost killed if Spopovich wasn't called back by Yamu

fight: Dabura vs. Kibito, Krillin, Piccolo, Goku, and Vegeta
charactersGood: Krillin, Piccolo, Goku, Vegeta, and Kibito

extra: Babidi changes the gravity in the spaceship to 10x Earth trying to help Pui Pui, not aware that Vegeta is used to much higher settings, thus easily defeating Pui Pui
Babidi transports Goku & Yakon to the latter's planet of darkness which forces Goku to power up to see
Goku makes Yakon absorb so much energy that he explodes

fight: Mighty Mask (Goten and Trunks) vs. Killa
extra: Goten and Trunks disguise themselves as Mighty Mask so they can also fight in the adult division of the World Tournament, easily beating Killa in the final Battle Royal
Android 18 swiftly defeats Jewel in the final Battle Royal

fight: Android 18 vs. Mighty Mask (Goten and Trunks)
extra: Android 18 quickly realizes that Mighty Mask is Trunks and Goten is disguise and exposes them, which disqualifies them
Android 18 strikes a deal with Mr. Satan to let him win if he pays her twice the prize money. He agrees and 'knocks' her out of the ring
Starting a bit rough, Gohan seems a match for Dabura in his SSJ 2 form

fight: Goku (Super Saiyan 2) vs. Majin Vegeta (Super Saiyan 2)
extra: Vegeta is taken over by Babidi and forces Goku to fight him. They start out in a even match, but Goku holds back his SSJ 3 form

fight: Goku (Super Saiyan 2) vs. Majin Vegeta (Super Saiyan 2)
extra: Vegeta reveals that he let Babidi transform him into Majin as to revert him back to his evil ways, which he thinks makes him stronger
Gohan is no match for Buu and presumed to be dead after the battle
Supreme Kai almost dies in his battle with Majin Buu
Majin Buu transforms Dabura into a cookie and gobbles him up

fight: Majin Vegeta (Super Saiyan 2) vs. Majin Buu
extra: Vegeta heroically sacrifices his own life to try and kill Majin Buu. However, Buu reforms making the sacrifice a vain one
Piccolo slices Babidi in half but Majin Buu regenerates him in the end
The first time we see a SSJ3 form in battle. Goku seems stronger than Majin Buu, but Buu regenerates every time
Trunks and Goten have fused into the annoying but powerful Gotenks, but he is still no match for Majin Buu
Majin Buu expels the evil in his body which transforms into Evil Buu. Majin Buu is too weak and eventually turned into chocolate and eaten by Evil Buu
Taking place in the Hyperbolic Time Chamber, a cocky Gotenks uselessly fights Buu with numerous silly-names attacks
Finally is SSJ3 form, Gotenks gets the upper hand over Buu, almost finishing him off before time runs out and he reverts back to base form
Gohan finally returns after training with the Kai's and is much stronger than Buu. Buu therefore self-destructs (and regenerates) so Gohan must retreat to save the others

fight: Gohan vs. Super Buu (Goten, Trunks, and Piccolo absorbed)
charactersBad: Super Buu (Goten, Trunks, and Piccolo absorbed)
extra: Buu tricks the Z fighters and absorbs Trunks, Goten and Piccolo making him stronger than Gohan

fight: Goku (Super Saiyan 3) vs. Super Buu (Goten, Trunks, and Piccolo absorbed) (anime only)
charactersBad: Super Buu (Goten, Trunks, and Piccolo absorbed)
extra: Goku returns after he is given Old Kai's life force

fight: Goku (Super Saiyan 2) and Vegeta (Super Saiyan 2) vs. Super Buu (Goten, Trunks, Piccolo, and Gohan absorbed) (anime only)
charactersBad: Super Buu (Goten, Trunks, Piccolo, and Gohan absorbed)
extra: As the situation is desperate, Vegeta is granted a 1-day pass back to Earth however, the Goku-Vegeta team is still not strong enough

fight: Vegito (Base/Super Saiyan) vs. Super Buu (Goten, Trunk, Piccolo, and Gohan absorbed)
charactersBad: Super Buu (Goten, Trunks, Piccolo, and Gohan absorbed)
extra: Goku and Vegeta (very reluctantly) fuse into Vegito who them dominates over Super Buu even in base form

fight: Yamcha vs. Olibu and Other World Warrior (anime only)
Candy Vegito vs. Super Buu (Goten, Trunks, Piccolo, and Gohan absorbed)
charactersBad: Super Buu (Goten, Trunks, Piccolo, and Gohan absorbed)
extra: Even after Buu transforms Vegito into a brown candy jawbreaker, he is still beaten quite badly, forcing him to turn Vegito back to his normal state
After having been absorbed on purpose to save the remaining Z fighters inside Buu, Vegito splits apart and has to battle illusions of their friends

fight: Vegeta (Super Saiyan) vs. Gotenks (Super Saiyan 3-image) and Piccolo (image) (anime only)
extra: Another image that Vegeta has to fight in the quest to reach Buu's brain

fight: Goku (Super Saiyan) and Vegeta (Super Saiyan) vs. Super Buu (anime only)
extra: Super Buu sends a mental image of himself into his brain to stop Goku and Vegeta. Vegeta eventually cuts the good Buu loose after which Buu's body breaks down

fight: Kid Buu vs. Western Supreme Kai (flashback) (anime only)
Kid Buu vs. Northern Supreme Kai (flashback) (anime only)
Kid Buu vs. Southern Supreme Kai (flashback) (anime only)
Majin Buu (Southern Supreme Kai absorbed) vs. Eastern Supreme Kai and Grand Supreme Kai (flashback) (anime only)
charactersBad: Eastern Supreme Kai and Grand Supreme Kai

fight: Kid Buu vs. Goku (Super Saiyan) and Vegeta (Super Saiyan)
extra: Having destroyed Earth while transformed into his final, insane & irrational form, Kid Buu travels to the Other World to fight Goku and Vegeta

fight: Krillin, Yamcha, Pikkon and Olibu vs. Kid Buu (anime only)

extra: Goku tries but is unable to defeat Kid Buu due to the latter's regeneration technique and perpetual strength
Vegeta steps in to take over from an exhausted Goku, but he is no match and easily beaten
Having gotten some time to recuperate Goku can fight in SSJ3 form again
Vegeta again takes over from Goku to give Goku the time to gather his energy for a final attack
After Vegeta falls, Mr. Satan steps in which Kid Buu is unable to attack until he spits out Good Majin Buu
After seeing Kid Buu beating Mr. Satan, Good Majin Buu starts to fight his insane counterpart, but is not strong enough
Vegeta tries to hold off Kid Buu for as long as he can while Goku is creating a massive Spirit Bomb
Kid Buu is finally overwhelmed and completely disintegrated after having been blasted by Goku's massive Spirit Bomb
10 years after Kid Buu's defeat Goku is (trying to) train Goten for the upcoming World Martial Arts Tournament
The young Pan, daughter of Gohan and Videl easily holds her own
Sensing that Uub is the good reincarnation of Buu, Goku fights Uub to sense his potential. Goku cuts the match short so he can start training Uub
Pan is seen having won over Goten, with Trunks holding her arm in victory
